name: Rally Speedway
description: Rally Speedway (known also as John Anderson's Rally Speedway) is a top-down racing game developed by John Anderson for the Atari 8-bit family and released by Adventure International in 1983. It was ported to the Commodore 64 and published by Commodore in 1985. Rally Speedway is similar in concept to Auto Racing for the Intellivision. The game includes an editor allowing players to create and save their own race tracks.
